thread.title: Mimi

author: Mimi
title: Mimi
text: Non-Scents Flowers makes paper flower bouquets with messages in each flower. We deliver mostly to hospitals and nursing homes. One resident who received our product as a gift complained about the "ugly" bag on her walker. She needed it to help carry items. So we designed a walker bag that was "pretty" and brought it to the lady. It was a hit, and we made more bags, but we needed packaging & we needed it fast. We called Clear Bags, spoke to them on the phone, and, within 3 days, they sent us bags that fit perfectly. We have already reordered the same bags and plan to contact Clear Bags as we add other products to our line.
